description:
The IT field has become extremely competitive with a lot of companies now requiring technicians to pass certain exams and hold certifications to prove their expertise.

The importance of technology in our lives require people who know what they are doing and simple experience in the field is no longer going to cut it. Technicians need to know the ins and outs of the technology they are working with, including the theory behind the practical application. This is the reason why many different certifications are popping up in almost all fields of IT.

CompTIA A+ certification is one the many different certifications currently on the market. However, holding this certificate gives you a whole lot of power. The certificate proves your competency and proficiency as a technician as well as gives you a boost in the terms of job opportunities. 

The CompTIA A+ certification is an entry-level certification that is recognized internationally, which means you can prove your proficiency without the limitation of borders. The certification has been divided into two separate tests – 220-801 & 220-802. 

The tests are not the easiest thing to ace; as it requires you to have basic knowledge about numerous different aspects of a computer. This means having to scour through a number of resources to gather study material.

Here is how this course can help!

Our course has been created to help students ace the tests without having to scramble for multiple textbooks or online resources. We have extensively collected all the material you need to study for the test. Additionally, we will also be your guide in helping you understand the curriculum of the test along with acing it.

The course will cover all the 5 domains that are part of the test: PC Hardware, Networking, Laptop, Printers, and Operational Procedures. It will further include the information under the major domains including basics such as assembling components, networking, security, diagnosing and repairing common issues, install, configure and maintain devices, troubleshooting, and also providing customer support.

At the end of this course, you will completely prepared to take the test head-on and even pass it with flying colors. So, what are you waiting for? Let’s get started on making your IT dream come true.
title: The Complete Guide To Comptia A+ Certification
